title: 11/6/21: Vaccine passport and Employee file
content: Following the announcement of the Quebec government concerning the mandatory vaccination of health and social services workers, Emprez proposes 2 tips to index this information and to decide on the accesses.Add a note on the employee file (if you just want to add the note without the vaccine passport)Add a document to the employee file (if you wish to add proof of vaccine passport)This note or document will not be visible in the schedule or in the timesheets. It will only be visible in the employee's file.Article suggestion: Preuves de vaccination adéquates, par quebec.caHelpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
